lead_paragraph: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola has expressed doubts over whether Manchester United can challenge for the Premier League title but believes they have a realistic chance of finishing in the top four.

headline.print_headline: Man United Have Ability to Finish in Top Four, Says Guardiola
headline.main: Man United Have Ability to Finish in Top Four, Says Guardiola

snippet: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola has expressed doubts over whether Manchester United can challenge for the Premier League title but believes they have a realistic chance of finishing in the top four....
